name: Love, Tears and Bloods
description: The artwork entitled "Love, Tears and Bloods" can be interpreted with various interpretations. This is because textually the objects contain multi-interpretative narrative potential. A man and a woman hugging a man carrying a heart for a woman he gives everything for her, behind that the female character is selfish and naive and stabs a man's back in a warm hug. Gestures of the two people's bodies can indicate communication that contains intimacy, it can also be conflict. this use of naive figures, bright colors, and linear lines.
